constituent: glossy, bountiful, bend, beans, table, one, mouth, colour, color, bound up, mosaic
koohiiStory1: To print something with bountiful colour, they use glossy paper.
koohiiStory2: Glossy prints bring out bountiful colors more so than matte...　　　　　RTK2:　エン　艶聞　えんぶん(love affair).
kunYomi: つや、なま.めかしい、あで.やか、つや.めく、なま.めく
words:
艶(えん): charming, fascinating, voluptuous
艶(つや): gloss, glaze
